headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.org 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://secure.walletconnect.org https://*.walletconnect.org https://*.vercel.app https://*.ngrok-free.app; frame-ancestors 'self' https://*.walletconnect.org https://secure-mobile.walletconnect.com https://secure-mobile.walletconnect.org;
